headline: Expand Energy price target lowered to $125 from $143 at BofA
summary: BofA lowered the firm’s price target on Expand Energy (EXE) to $125 from $143 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Bullish sentiment on natural gas has persisted for 18 months, but the firm sees rising risk of oversupply in 2027, which combined with lower price forecasts drives an average 12% reduction in its price objectives among the gas-levered E&P group.Claim 70% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the ma
